GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.17
GSD.description:
futex: Fix futex_waitv() hrtimer debug object leak on kcalloc error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit c496fdc3c6a7c51e4c10f7cc14ee5192a1df6472, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit bf69bad38cf63d980e8a603f8d1bd1f85b5ed3d9. For more details please see the references link.
